TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InitiatorServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement extends System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement

Docs.summary: Specifies a security property requirements specific to channel creation in the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks Token requirement classes are used by a security token manager to specify what is required of a security token, such as the key size, key type, and how the key can be used. When a security token can be identified that matches the specified criteria, a SecurityTokenProvider and SecurityTokenAuthenticator can be created.
This token requirement class specifies initiator-related requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement.SupportSecurityContextCancellationProperty%2A> is set to `false`. <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement.IsInitiatorProperty%2A> is set to `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the target address.
